content: 6 single_crochet = 9 sts slip_stitch bind off with a tail long enough to use for sewing later fig 23 antennae *in body color-- crochet in row -- no chain 1 turn at the end of each row just insert into the stitch closest to the hook if the format looks confusing - refer to page 4* short antennae make 2 row 1 chain 4 turn =4 sts in chbps 4 slip_stitch = 4 sts fig 24 medium antennae row 1 chain 6 turn =6 sts in chbps 2 single_crochet 4 slip_stitch = 4 sts fig 25 cut a short tail for later attaching to the body- i leave about 6 inches or 15 cm- and bind off 11 © emma scanga 2020 antennae continued *in body color-- crochet in row -- no single_crochet turn at the end of each row just insert into the stitch closest to the hook if the format looks confusing - refer to page 4* make l - shaped antennae 2 row 1 chain 9 turn = 9 sts in chbps 4 slip_stitch skip 1 chbp 4 slip_stitch = 9 sts fig 26 make 2 long antennae row 1 chain 9 turn = 9 sts in chbps single_crochet 8 slip_stitch = 9 sts fig 27 extra long antennae make 2 row 1 chain 15 turn = 15 sts in chbps slip_stitch 2 single_crochet 12 slip_stitch = 15 sts fig 28 cut a short tail for later attaching to the body- i leave about 6 inches or 15 cm- and bind off which antennae you use will depend on the creature you choose to make mine are only suggestions and you can mix and match however you choose here is a side by side of all the antennae so you can see the difference in relation to each other though i do suggest experimenting to see which looks best for what you want to make 12 © emma scanga 2020 speckles and spots small diamond you can do as many of these as you like or as few *in accent color-- crochet in row* or none i suggest waiting until you have the legs row 1 chain 2 turn = 2 sts assembled and all of the face shaping done before 2 single_crochet in chbp turn = 2 sts choosing the details you can always come back to row 2 2 single_crochet = 2 sts this page later or look up some great embroidery bind off leave tail for sewing fig 31 designs and embroider a unique pattern on the head and back small chevron medium diamond *in accent color-- crochet in row* *in accent color-- crochet in row* row 1 chain 3 turn = 3 sts row 1 chain 4 turn = 4 sts 3 single_crochet in chbp turn = 3 sts 4 single_crochet in chbp turn = 4 sts row 2 3 single_crochet turn = 3 sts row 2 chain 3 turn = 3 sts 3 single_crochet = 3 sts 3 single_crochet in chbp
